
% https://tikzcd.yichuanshen.de/#-WKl2QuihFXGd2AACtHv9GrkUo4TO8ZAi6OZvsBfrimkoCedBpFSAAWaETJiCTgAWzoODWiylQjAwjs0k2TC6Tk46qR3AA4ktVhstjt9vk-gDjnjRNK6Gg4DgINwJcBbXKFUqVSz1R55ga0UbMaacZx2M7JewZe7FbIvdq6ExfR85kz2Dr3GcBiUrqLybdEgBVCNR+Ux5WqnCakw4XV6ryGjEm7GuDn1y3PUSplzxl0iTncumA3nSGX2x3cIuuyOy0ue4TOHC+5F1hvGrFm+uhsOTt2z2PzxfcB5tRw1jPCfQwKAreBECjCIA
\begin{tikzcd}
\{ F_{i} \}_{i \in I} &  &
\{ n_{i}\}_{i\in I} := \{(F_{i})c\}_{i\in I} \\
F := \oplus_{i\in I} F_{i} &  &
n := \oplus_{i\in I} n_{i} \\ n = Fc\\
\{\pi_{i} : F \rightarrow F_{i} \}_{i\in I} &  &
\{p_{i}\}_{i\in I} := \{(\pi_{i})_{c}\}_{i\in I} \\
\{ \iota_{i} : F_{i} \rightarrow F \}_{i\in I} &  &
\{j_{i}\}_{i\in I} := \{(\iota_{i})_{c}\}_{i\in I} \\
u_{\mathrm{in}} : \tau = \{\tau_{i} : G \rightarrow F_{i}\}_{i\in I} \mapsto u_{\mathrm{in}}(\tau) : G \rightarrow F \\
u_{\mathrm{in}}(\tau) \pi_{i} = \tau_{i} &  & 
U_{\mathrm{in}} : t = \{t_{i} : Gc \rightarrow (F_{i})c \}_{i\in I} = \{(\tau_{i})_{c}\}_{i\in I} \mapsto U_{\mathrm{in}}(t) : Gc \rightarrow Fc \\
U_{\mathrm{in}}(t) p_{i} = t_{i}
\end{tikzcd}
